title: Application crash on clicking the SAVE button while creating a new user.
description: Hence unable to create a new user in the application. Steps to reproduce: 1. Log into the application 2. Navigate to the users menu and click new user 3. Fill user information fields 4. Click save

title: Unable to add new item to my cart
The price mentioned on the pricing page is not correct
description: Steps to reproduce: Go to the princing page, it says the basic plan is $25 but it should be $29.
